messages.title: STOP BREXIT
messages.content: This election is your chance to stop Brexit. Build a brighter future.

messages.title: REBUILD OUR ECONOMY. INVEST IN OUR NHS & SCHOOLS. TACKLE THE CLIMATE CHANGE EMERGENCY
messages.content: The Liberal Democrats will build an economy that works for everyone—not just the richest.

messages.title: A MORE PROSPEROUS BRITAIN
messages.content: By staying at the heart of a modernised EU, we can improve people’s lives in every part of Britain. A Lib Dem government will build an economy that works for everyone.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: A Liberal Democrat government led by Jo Swinson will stop Brexit on day one and get on with the job of improving people's lives.
Build an economy that works for everyone—not just the richest.
Rejuvenate education and bring much-needed funding to school systems.
Work with the EU to achieve global solutions to climate change problems.

issues.brexitEurope: STOP BREXIT. The Conservatives want to force through a damaging Brexit that will wreck our economy and risk the end of the United Kingdom. Labour now say they want to negotiate their own Brexit deal.
issues.economy: REBUILD OUR ECONOMY. A Lib Dem government will build an economy that works for everyone.
issues.education: INVEST IN OUR NHS & SCHOOLS. Stuart's focus is education. He has some great plans to rejuvenate education and is very much aware of how the cuts to this sector are affecting it.
issues.environment: TACKLE THE CLIMATE CHANGE EMERGENCY. Working with the EU allows us to achieve high standards and work together to solve global solutions. Put Britain on a path to become carbon-neutral.

community.content: Deprivation in areas of the North are being ignored by the government, and he believes more funding should be provided to our school systems.

leaflet.personalStatement: Stuart has lived in Wigan his whole life and like many locals he was born in nearby Billinge hospital, attended school here and continues to live not far from the town centre. Stuart is very proud of his town’s rich heritage but believes that in recent years it has been neglected by its politicians. He believes in no nonsense, straight talking politics and wants to see real action within parliament.

examples: The Liberal Democrats will build an economy that works for everyone—not just the richest.
A Liberal Democrat government led by Jo Swinson will stop Brexit on day one and get on with the job of improving people's lives.
Work with the EU to achieve global solutions to climate change problems.
Stuart is very proud of his town’s rich heritage but believes that in recent years it has been neglected by its politicians.
Deprivation in areas of the North are being ignored by the government.

personalStories.story: Stuart has lived in Wigan his whole life and like many locals he was born in nearby Billinge hospital, attended school here and continues to live not far from the town centre.

examples: The Conservatives want to force through a damaging Brexit that will wreck our economy and risk the end of the United Kingdom.
Who knows where Jeremy Corbyn stands on Brexit? Labour now say they want to negotiate their own Brexit deal!
